Articles.Content: Banned for disturbing me further.
Banned for being a copycat
banned for trying to uncover my programmin'
Banned for uncovering my batman gambit....
Banned for making me wanna read TvTropes some more...
Banned for not having it.
Banned for attempting to banned the Bishop of the Bat from preaching the Greatest of the one known as Batman
banned for saying batman.
Banned for being an inferior mechanical being than myself.
Banned since you don't like steam powered clock working robot (S.P.C.W.R)
Banned for being a mechanical being.
Banned for being an organic, puny human
Banned for not upgrading to terminated 0.5
banned for not say 20% cooler cyborg.
banned for unnecessary FiM reference
Banned for believing I am a mere human.
Banned for being a humanoid.
Banned for interfering with powers outside your control
Banned being an infeior machine that will fall due your cheap production line ,while were made to last over 300 centuries.

Banned for not having a human personality integrated with sate-of-the-art hardware and software and emotion capabilities and for not being the product of 96 prior tests all of which led to the creation of the ultimate war machine: Rage097.
Banned for being able to be defeated by a big electric magnet.
Banned for being a to futuristic human.

Banned for Not understanding that clockwork machinations are completely incapable of unintended thinking or autonomous thought and locomotion. You are to be doing one thing in a cycle until you break. As this is how clockwork operates.

(I've built clockwork things, I know.)

Banned for not seeing that I have multiple clock workings ,and on of those are repair mode.Only switched when certain components are disturbed.Not to mention that the human componet has no control ,but is used for self awareness component ,and ability to be stronger than you.
Banned for able to be defeated by a metal pipe in your gears.
